programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: A man cheats on his girlfriend, then tries to apologize; a woman realizes the father of her child could be her good friend's boyfriend; a woman gets more than she bargained for when she hooks up with her friend's roommate.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Greg will reveal to his girlfriend, Deidra, that he secretly works as a gay, male escort. Next Madrina's boyfriend keeps cheating on her with his ex­. Then Ro-Ro has two girlfriends and today they'll force her to choose between them.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Antoine has been hiding the fact that he is gay from his family and his girlfriend. Now he wants to let them know the truth, and furthermore that he has been having a relationship with his sisters boyfriend.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Whitney learns what really happens during her children's father's late-night sessions at the recording studio; new mom Coralena is engaged in a war between her fiance and her friend; Denzel's girlfriends fight over him.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Destiny admits to cheating on her live-in boyfriend with a one-night stand; an all-out battle ensues after Kashe confesses to hooking up with her cousin's girlfriend; two men challenge each other to an eating contest to win Amber.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Regina tells her daughter, Angela, that she is getting married to her ex-boyfriend! Next Suzanne is tired of her boyfriend complaining about her job as an exotic entertainer. Then Tanya is here to tell Bryan's wife about their affair.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Mookie has a confession that could be a deal breaker; Kelvin assures his girlfriend that an encounter he had at a movie theater meant nothing; two women's feelings are mutual, but one of them has a boyfriend.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Joanne wants to have a threesome with her friend and the friend's boyfriend; Ron's girlfriend is insanely jealous for a reason; Jazmen confronts her boyfriend and a woman he has been sexting.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Scotty says he feels like his girlfriend has a GPS on him 24/7; Giovanni blames his girlfriend for his infidelity; Winona wants to spice things up in the bedroom.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Briget wants the rumors about her boyfriend's cheating to stop; Samantha says her best friend has turned into her worst enemy; Moniqua wants to get her ex-boyfriend's new baby-mama out of the picture.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Steve helps a pregnant prostitute change her lifestyle.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Kevin is settling down with Ashley, but his baby mama Sandra won’t just take it! Gena lied about her pregnancy to stay married to Rico, but now Rico is the liar! He’s coming clean about cheating with Shamika!

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Chris is here today to tell his girlfriend, Chrissy, about his sexual fetish. Next we meet Mistress Tara, the dominatrix who caters to Chris' fantasy. We'll watch him pretend to be a dog.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.sub-title: A Bounty Hunter and a Gay Stripper
programme.desc: A woman tells her bounty-hunter husband that she is cheating with a stripper, who turns out to be gay; a woman finds out about her boyfriend's secret lover.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: It's Jerry's birthday and he's throwing one heck of a wild birthday bash! It's a wild birthday spectacular on today's Jerry Springer!

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.sub-title: Lesbians Come Out ... of the Cold
programme.desc: Derrick reveals a secret he has been keeping from the woman he has been seeing; lesbian stripper Diana is on a mission to break up one relationship and start a new one; Summer is a lesbian who cannot stop having sex with men.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Athena is here to tell her fiancé that she is cheating, and that she poses nude on the Internet. Next Monica is cheating with her husband's best friend! Later Billy will admit to his girlfriend that he's been having an affair with her best friend.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Deshawn is engaged to his baby's mother, but it did not stop him from hooking up with his friend; Quan must reveal a secret to his fiancee; Makayla has a confession that could end her engagement.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.sub-title: A Deer Hunter & An Army Gal
programme.desc: A man wants to leave his wife for one of her friends; a man sleeps with his cousin's girlfriend.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: After Mike became a dad, he felt trapped and bored from fatherhood and found Liz! Sherrie fights to win Don back from his gay lover Warren! Gloria’s matchmaking days are over as her best friend Andrea slept with her fiancé!

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Zack and Cheyenne have differing hopes for their future; Nee Nee confronts the friend she thinks is trying to sabotage her relationship with her boyfriend; Stormi confesses to sleeping with her friend's man.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Missy and Kevin dated online, but he moved on to Whitney. Missy won’t stop chasing him! Rebecca won’t let Tony get away with cheating on her. His friends say she’s lying! Stacy’s best friend Amanda crashed with her and slept with her man Bryan!

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Mehren says everything would be just great with her boyfriend, John, if only his wife would leave them alone! Next Greg is here to tell his girlfriend that he's been cheating with her best friend, Yolanda!

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Anita is ready to dump her husband for her ex-lover. Next Theresa is cheating on her fiancé with his brother! Later Kevin is here to ell his girlfriend's ex, Jermaine, to back off.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: SpringerCam joins Sam on a trucking trip where he professes his love and devotion for two women. Then Edward is here to confess to his wife that he's been having an affair with her sister! When the two sisters confront Edward, he's goin' home alone!

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Arianna learns that her girlfriend has another on the side; Anthony says he made a mistake in cheating on his girlfriend, but the other woman will stop at nothing to be with him.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.sub-title: I Slept With Your Twin & Your Mom
programme.desc: A woman sleeps with her twin sister's boyfriend; a man is caught between two women; a man asks a friend to lie for him.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Barin's new girlfriend has a secret; Ericka disapproves of her sister's girlfriend; another man may ruin Tyler's wedding.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Jada says that one lover is not enough. She wants to confront her boyfriend to tell him that there's someone else. Next Brandy's husband has moved out to be with his mistress, Rachel. Then Danielle confesses to Rashanda that she is the other woman.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Audrina is prepared to get to the bottom of rumors that her boyfriend slept with her strip-club co-worker; Ashley's husband wants her permission to have sex with other women; Stephanie's revelation may ruin her bond with her newfound sister.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Glenda has been hiding two secrets from her boyfriend: She's secretly been seeing her ex and she wants to be a stripper! Then Veronica broke up with Roland when she caught him cheating. Now she's dating one of his friends and Roland wants her back.
